mapper.select: select MEDCIN_CD, MEDCIN_NM, MEDCIN_INVNTRY, MEDCIN_MFBIZ, MDCTN_COURS, MEDCIN_PC, MEDCIN_STANDARD, MEDCIN_UNIT from medicine where 1=1 order by MEDCIN_CD desc
select PORDER_CD, PORDER_CT, PORDER_DATE, PORDER_TOTAL, PORDER_CONFM from purchase_order order by PORDER_CD desc
select MEDCIN_CD, MEDCIN_NM, MEDCIN_INVNTRY, MEDCIN_PC from medicine where MEDCIN_NM like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' order by MEDCIN_NM asc
select MEDCIN_CD, MEDCIN_NM, MEDCIN_INVNTRY, MEDCIN_MFBIZ, MDCTN_COURS, MEDCIN_PC, MEDCIN_STANDARD, MEDCIN_UNIT from medicine where MEDCIN_NM = #{medcinNm}
select MEDCIN_CD, MEDCIN_NM, MEDCIN_INVNTRY, MEDCIN_MFBIZ, MDCTN_COURS, MEDCIN_PC, MEDCIN_STANDARD, MEDCIN_UNIT from medicine where MEDCIN_NM = #{medcinNm}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO purchase_order_detail PODETAIL_CD, PODETAIL_NM, PODETAIL_MFBIZ, PODETAIL_UNIT, PODETAIL_AMOUNT, PODETAIL_TOTAL, PODETAIL_MEMO VALUES (#{podetailCd}, #{porderCd}, #{podetailNm}, #{podetailUnit}, #{podetailAmount}, #{podetailTotal}, #{podetailMemo})
